TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputBindingCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class InputBindingCollection Implements IList
public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList

summary.span: Representa uma coleção ordenada de objetos de .

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Todos os objetos que derivam de tem um chamado .All objects that derive from have an named . Todos os objetos que derivam de tem um chamado .All objects that derive from have an named . No entanto, se essas coleções são definidas na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], em seguida, os itens na coleção devem ser classes derivadas de em vez de direta objetos.However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. Isso ocorre porque não oferece suporte a um construtor público padrão.This is because does not support a default public constructor. Portanto, os itens em uma que foi definida no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] geralmente será um derivado da classe que dá suporte a um construtor público padrão, como ou .Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples O exemplo a seguir cria um e o associa um .The following example creates a and associates it with a . O é adicionada para o em um .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

returns.span: Isso se desvia da implementação de padrão para , que deve retornar o índice em que o novo item foi adicionado à coleção.

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo a seguir cria um e o associa um .The following example creates a and associates it with a . O é adicionada para o em um .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] exemplo não usa literalmente , mas é chamado implicitamente, o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] suporte para coleções de processamento.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use , but is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections. Para obter detalhes sobre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] e coleções, consulte [visão geral de XAML (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
